data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Technology has made the world a better place. Do you agree or disagree? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: When it comes to whether technology has made the world a better place, I would strongly agree with it. First of all, technology underlies almost every aspect of today's human society. That is to say, human beings' activities are heavily dependent on technology. For instance, without the invention of the plane, people wouldn't be able to travel the world either for fun or for business in a remarkably short period; what's more, without the invention of the internet, people wouldn't be able to learn the news and communicate so quickly. （90 字）
